Package com.opera.core.systems.arguments

Class Summary
OperaArgument OperaArgument represents a single argument in a command-line argument list, typically represented by OperaArguments.
OperaCoreArguments Handles a list of strings/arguments for the Opera core binary.
OperaDesktopArguments Handles a list of strings/arguments for the Opera Desktop binary.
 

Enum Summary
OperaArgument.OperaArgumentSign Holds definitions for prepended signs for arguments in various styles.
